doc:
Victor Rendina https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victor_Rendina 0 Victor Rendina (December 28, 1916 – July 8, 1985) was an American film and television actor perhaps best known for his portrayal of Philip Tattaglia in the film The Godfather.Rendina also appeared in television shows including The Honeymooners and Matt Houston, and films such as The Man Who Wasn't There (1983) and Racing with the Moon (1984). Victor_Rendina ( December_28_,_1916 – July_8_,_1985 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor perhaps_best_known for his_portrayal of Philip_Tattaglia in the_film The_Godfather.Rendina also appeared in television_shows including The_Honeymooners_and_Matt_Houston , and films such_as The_Man Who Was n't There ( 1983 ) and Racing with the_Moon ( 1984 ) .
